## hpr1488 :: What's on My Podcatcher

 
After listening to Ahuka describe his favourite podcasts on HPR1479 and HPR1482 I was surprised to see how few of the shows we listen to overlap. There are so many podcasts out there it's always good to be able to get recommendations. I present to you my list of 30 podcasts (I had to cull the list down a bit).


99% Invisible
 
Website: https://99percentinvisible.org/

Feed: https://99percentinvisible.org/feed/



Accidental Tech Podcast
 
Website: https://atp.fm/

Feed: https://atp.fm/episodes?format=rss



The Alton Browncast
 
Website: https://www.nerdist.com/podcast/the-browncast/

Feed: https://www.nerdist.com/feed/



Astronomy Cast
 
Website: https://www.astronomycast.com/

Feed: https://www.astronomycast.com/feed/



Back to Work
 
Website: https://5by5.tv/b2w

Feed: https://feeds.5by5.tv/b2w



Click
 
Website: https://www.bbc.co.uk/podcasts/series/digitalp

Feed: https://downloads.bbc.co.uk/podcasts/worldservice/digitalp/rss.xml



The Domestic CEO
 
Website: https://www.quickanddirtytips.com/domestic-ceo

Feed: https://www.quickanddirtytips.com/xml/domestic.xml



FLOSS Weekly
 
Website: https://twit.tv/floss

Feed: https://twit.tv/show/floss-weekly/feed



From Python Import Podcast
 
Website: https://frompythonimportpodcast.com/

Feed: (Ogg): https://feeds.feedburner.com/FromPythonImportPodcastogg

Feed: (MP3): https://feeds.feedburner.com/FromPythonImportPodcastmp3



Geologic Podcast
 
Website: https://geologicpodcast.com/

Feed: https://geologicpodcast.com/rss



Get-It-Done Guy
 
Website: https://www.quickanddirtytips.com/get-it-done-guy

Feed: https://www.quickanddirtytips.com/xml/getitdone.xml



Girl on Guy
 
Website: https://girlonguy.net/

Feed: https://girlonguy.libsyn.com/rss



Going Linux
 
Website: https://goinglinux.com/

Feed: (Ogg): https://goinglinux.com/oggpodcast.xml

Feed: (MP3): https://goinglinux.com/mp3podcast.xml



Grammar Girl
 
Website: https://www.quickanddirtytips.com/grammar-girl

Feed: https://www.qdnow.com/grammar.xml



Hacker Public Radio
 
CONTRIBUTE: https://hackerpublicradio.org/contribute.php

ASK ME FOR HELP: https://twitter.com/kdmurray

Website: https://hackerpublicradio.org/

Feed: (Ogg): https://hackerpublicradio.org/hpr_ogg_rss.php

Feed: (MP3): https://hackerpublicradio.org/hpr_rss.php



Hanselminutes
 
Website: https://hanselminutes.com/

Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/HanselminutesCompleteMP3



A History Of Alexander / Hannibal
 
Website: https://thehistoryofpodcast.blogspot.com/

Feed: (Alexander): https://ia601204.us.archive.org/27/items/AlexanderFeed/AlexanderHistoryRemastered.XML

Feed: (Hanibal): https://ia700801.us.archive.org/8/items/HannibalFeed/HistoryHannibalandthePunicWars.XML



The History of Rome
 
Website: https://thehistoryofrome.typepad.com/

Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/thehistoryofrome



IRL Talk
 
Website: https://www.irltalk.com/

Feed: https://feedpress.me/irltalk



Knightcast
 
Website: https://knightwise.com/

Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/knightwisecom



Mac OS Ken
 
Website: https://macosken.com/

Feed: https://macosken.libsyn.com/rss



Mac Power Users
 
Website: https://www.macpowerusers.com/

Feed: https://feeds.5by5.tv/mpu



The Memory Palace
 
Website: https://thememorypalace.us/

Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/thememorypalace



Mission Log
 
Website: https://missionlogpodcast.com/

Feed: https://missionlog.libsyn.com/rss



The Nosillacast
 
Website: https://www.podfeet.com/blog/

Feed: https://podfeet.com/NosillaCast/rss.xml



Radiolab
 
Website: https://www.radiolab.org/

Feed: https://www.radiolab.org/feeds/podcast/



RunAs Radio
 
Website: https://runasradio.com/

Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/RunasRadio



Security Now
 
Website: https://twit.tv/show/security-now

Feed: https://feeds.twit.tv/sn.xml



Spark
 
Website: https://www.cbc.ca/spark/

Feed: https://www.cbc.ca/podcasting/includes/spark.xml



StarTalk Radio
 
Website: https://www.startalkradio.net/

Feed: https://feeds.soundcloud.com/users/soundcloud:users:38128127/sounds.rss
